review_text: This is a fantastic course. There is so much actionable information that I want to watch it again 3 more times. I would have loved even more!
I think good for more learn
Relevant and updated as per current trends.
highly recommend.
This class is a great intro for beginners.
Good details for the beginner.

I really enjoyed the 1st 10 videos, from video 11 or 12 things go a bit pear-shaped, the videos and audio don't always match up some videos are repeated. I found the analytics section too advanced and rather confusing for me as a beginner.
Amazing content put into words by a super guy. Thank you for the boost of knowledge :)

It was a little complicated. I will need to review the content more to fully grasp it. Part of me wonders if I needed all that information, but that will not be clear until I get more into actually doing it. I am glad to have continued access for the future.
Another quality course! Thanks for the knowledge!

Very basic things that I know already. I expect some real-life campaigns overview to understand how email marketing grow business activity. But unfortunately, this course gives a lot of information with a demo account. 

For newer, it will be helpful definitely.

To be honest, for the price I paid, I got much more valued than I expected, perfect course for beginner and novice e-mail marketers. This course really helped me get on course as well as organise my campaigns like the pros would do it.
A great curse for beginners. Thank you.
I’m new to email marketing, and this course was great to inform and help the newbie get their feet wet! Love the content and I’m hungry for more!
Exceptional lesson. By taking this course I fix a lot of missing in my work. Thank you Fiverr and thank you, Chan
Straight to the point, very good modules/strategy with example!! Really excited to apply.
its really a good course, basic info but important for a new learner.
A great course. Good insights. But there are some error with the videos
great information to grow my business for 2020
Very nice course!  I use a lot of marketing for my small business and didn't know anything about Mailchimp.  Great knowledge to incorporate into my business going forward!
pretty good. sound and video de-synced sometimes.  a little quick on some points.  current UI of mailchimp does not sync with the content.

This learn course is out of date with the current Mailchimp. There is no list section. An entire section of this course can not be followed along with. 

There are also grammar and spelling errors riddled throughout the course.
He did a great job presenting the information on how to use email marketing!
Need more indepth explanation about email marketing and Mailchimp.I will have to take other course.Though,I learnt something new.

Jon is a great presenter and a good teacher.  I would have scored higher but he moved so fast through the analytical pieces, I had to keep starting over and still not sure I got it, which is on me.  But, I think those subjects are too important to not take time to thoroughly teach at an absorbable rate.
A quantitative and qualitative course of the true forms and use of Email Marketing.
Good start for Email Marketing Fundamentals Using Mailchimp.
Great and thorough course on email marketing. It’s awesome for begginers in this field. There is a whole bunch of useful stuff. I highly recommend this course.

The course is in my opinion a comprehensive overview of Mailchimp and email marketing. I hope the content perfectly applies to the current version of the software (somebody said no, I haven't tried yet). Maybe a few slides did not perfectly follow his words but you could listen and understand anyway (1 lesson was also a duplicate of another one). In any case, it's more than I expected for the price.
Need easier simple step by step to to list, and a list of sites that are helpful such as the one he mentioned goodemailcopy. Great guy good course thanks.
Amazing course for beginners.
Great course!
The Website page has updated and I have no idea how to navigate right now I'm just skipping this for now. Until you rectify this issue thanks!!
Very informative. This will really help me in my daily task at work.

This course was amazing and very easy to follow. The videos were short enough for you to capture what is being said. I would recommend this course to anyone especially those in fields of virtual assistance. There is so much more that you can learn about email from doing this course.
really nice course i learned a bunch of new stuff
It's a really good course. I have been doing email marketing for years and I still learned quite a few new things! Jon is great :)
really easy to understand for beginners with a ton of applicable pointers
Awesome presenter! The course is packed with value, in-depth, and to the point.
Great course!  Covered all the basics of creating campaigns and testing in Mailchimp in a straight to the point and easy to understand format.
A START

Excellent course for someone new to email marketing. 
One pickup point is that not all videos are correctly synched to the audio. 
Some videos show images that aren't relevant to what is being said.
With an update to those minor faults, this will be a 5 star course!
Excellent course!
examples were great to understand.
Great course that covers everything I needed to know on email marketing! Super helpful!
Great course. Learn a lot of new tips and tricks about email marketing.
Good course!
It was a great course Jon handled it well.
I would definitely recommend taking this course
THAT'S WAS REALLY AWESOME
Its awesome
Very educative
Great course, on point

WOW! The instructor was indeed awesome.

He did cover both the basics and the advanced topics of email marketing.

Great!

I learned a lot more then I expected.  It went in depth into topics like, drip trees.  There were quizzes which were a nice review.  I like how I was able to pause and rewind.  I recommend taking this course, because I guarantee you will learn something.  Thank You.
Best Email Marketing Fundamentals Using Mailchimp Course.
